Verses: 1 appozhudhu Parisuththa Sthalaththuth Thiruppanigalukkaduththa Sagala Velaigalaiyum, Karththar Karpiththabadiyellaam, Pesaleyelum Agoliyaabum, Seyya Ariyumbadikkuk Karththaraal Gnaanamum Puththiyum Petra Vivega Irudhayamulla Matra Anaivarum Seyyaththodanginaargal.

2 besaleyelaiyum Agoliyaapaiyum, Karththaraal Gnaanamadaindhu Andha Velaigalaich Seyyavarumbadi Thangal Irudhayaththil Ezhuppudhaladaindha Gnaana Irudhayaththaaraagiya Ellaaraiyum, Mose Varavazhaiththaan.

3 avargal, Isravel Puththirar Thiruppanikkaduththa Sagala Velaigalukkaagavum Konduvandha Kaanikkaip Porulgalaiyellaam, Moseyinidaththil Vaangikkondaargal. Pinnum Janangal Kaalaidhorum Thangalukku Ishtamaana Kaanikkaigalai Avanidaththil Konduvandhaargal.
4 appozhudhu Parisuththa Sthalaththu Velaigalaich Seygira Vivekigal Yaavarum Avaravar Seygira Velaiyin Kaariyamaai Vandhu,
5 moseyai Nokki: Karththar Seyyumbadi Karpiththa Velaikku Vendiyadharku Adhigamaana Porulgalai Janangal Konduvarugiraargal Endraargal.

6 appozhudhu Mose Ini Purushargalaavadhu Sthireegalaavadhu Parisuththa Sthalaththukkendru Kaanikkaiyaaga Oru Velaiyum Seyyavendaam Endru Paalayam Engum Koorumbadi Kattalaiyittaan; Ivvidhamaai Janangal Konduvarugiradhu Niruththappattadhu.
7 seyyavendiya Ellaa Velaigalukkum Podhumaana Porulgal Irundhadhumallaamal Adhigamaayum Irundhadhu.

8 velaiseygiravargalaagiya Gnaana Irudhayamulla Yaavarum Vaasasthalaththai Undaakkinaargal. Adharkuth Thiriththa Melliya Panjunoolaalum Ilaneelanoolaalum Raththaambaranoolaalum Sivappunoolaalum, Vinodha Nesavuvelaiyaagiya Kerubeengalulla Paththu Moodudhiraigalaip Panninaan.
9 ovvoru Moodudhirai Iruvaththettu Muzha Neelamum Naalu Muzha Agalamumaayirundhadhu; Moodudhiraigalellaam Ore Alavaayirundhadhu.
10 aindhu Moodudhiraigalai Ondrodondru Inaiththu, Matra Aindhu Moodudhiraigalaiyum Ondrodondru Inaiththaan.
11 inaikkappatta Oru Moodudhiraiyin Oraththil Ilaneelanoolaal Aimbadhu Kaadhugalai Undupanni, Appadiye Inaikkappatta Matra Moodudhiraiyin Oraththilum Undupanninaan.
12 kaadhugal Ondrodondru Inaikkappattavaigalaayirundhadhu.
13 aimbadhu Pon Kokkigalaiyum Panni, Andhak Kokkigalaal Moodudhiraigalai Ondrodondru Inaiththuvittaan. Ivvidhamaaga Ore Vaasasthalamaayitru.
14 vaasasthalaththinmel Koodaaramaagap Podumbadi Aattumayirinaal Neydha Padhinoru Moodudhiraigalaiyum Panninaan.
15 ovvoru Moodudhirai Muppadhu Muzha Neelamum Naalu Muzha Agalamumaayirundhadhu. Padhinoru Moodudhiraigalum Ore Alavaayirundhadhu.
16 aindhu Moodudiraigalai Ondraakavum, Matra Aaru Moodudhiraigalai Ondraakavum Inaiththu,
17 inaikkappatta Oru Moodudhiraiyin Oraththil Aimbadhu Kaadhugalaiyum, Inaikkappatta Matra Moodudhiraiyin Oraththil Aimbadhu Kaadhugalaiyum Undaakki,
18 koodaaraththai Ondraai Inaiththuvida, Aimbadhu Vengalak Kokkigalaiyum Undaakkinaan.
19 sivappuththeerndha Aattukkadaath Tholinaal Koodaaraththukku Oru Moodiyaiyum Adhinmel Podath Thagasuththolinaal Oru Moodiyaiyum Undupanninaan.
20 vaasasthalaththukku Nimirndhunirkum Palagaigalaiyum Seeththim Maraththaal Seydhaan.
21 ovvoru Palagaiyum Paththumuzha Neelamum Ondrarai Muzha Agalamumaayirundhadhu.
22 ovvoru Palagaikkum Ondrukkondru Samadhooramaana Irandu Kazhundhugal Irundhadhu; Vaasasthalaththin Palagaigalukkellaam Ippadiye Seydhaan.
23 vaasasthalaththirkaakach Seyyappatta Palagaigalil Therke Thendhisaikku Iruvadhu Palagaigalai Undaakki,

24 andha Iruvadhu Palagaigalin Keezhe Vaikkum Naarpadhu Vellip Paadhangalaiyum Undupanninaan; Oru Palagaiyin Keezh Adhin Irandu Kazhundhugalukkum Irandu Paadhangalaiyum, Matrap Palagaiyinkeezh Adhin Irandu Kazhundhugalukkum Irandu Paadhangalaiyum Pannivaiththu;
25 vaasasthalaththin Marupakkamaagiya Vadapuraththil Iruvadhu Palagaigalaiyum, Avaigalukku Naarpadhu Vellip Paadhangalaiyum Seydhaan.
26 oru Palagaiyinkeezh Irandu Paadhangalum, Matrap Palagaiyinkeezh Irandu Paadhangalum Seydhaan.
27 vaasasthalaththin Melpuraththirku Aaru Palagaigalaiyum,
28 vaasasthalaththin Irupakkangalilulla Moolaigalukku Irandu Palagaigalaiyum Seydhaan.
29 avaigal Keezhe Isaikkappattirundhadhu, Meleyum Oru Valaiyaththinaal Isaikkappattirundhadhu; Irandu Moolaigalilumulla Avvirandirkum Appadiye Seydhaan.
30 appadiye Ettup Palagaigalum, Avaigaludaiya Ovvoru Palagaiyin Keezh Irandirandu Paadhangalaagap Padhinaaru Vellippaadhangalum Irundhadhu.
31 seeththim Maraththaal Vaasasthalaththin Oru Pakkaththup Palagaigalukku Aindhu Thaazhppaalgalaiyum,
32 vaasasthalaththin Marupakkaththup Palagaigalukku Aindhu Thaazhppaalgalaiyum, Vaasasthalaththin Melpuramaana Pinpakkaththup Palagaigalukku Aindhu Thaazhppaalgalaiyum Panninaan.
33 naduththaazhppaal Oru Munaidhodangi Marumunaimattum Palagaigalin Maiyaththil Uruvappaayumbadi Seydhaan.
34 palagaigalaip Pondhakattaal Moodi, Thaazhppaalgalin Idangalaagiya Avaigalin Valaiyangalaip Ponninaal Panni, Thaazhppaalgalaip Pondhakattaal Moodinaan.
35 ilaneelanoolaalum Raththaambaranoolaalum Sivappunoolaalum Thiriththa Melliya Panjunoolaalum Seyyappattadhum, Visiththiravelaiyaagiya Kerubeengalulladhumaana Oru Thiraichcheelaiyai Undupanni,
36 adharkuch Seeththim Maraththinaal Naalu Thoongalaiseydhu, Avaigalaip Pondhakattaal Moodi, Avaigalin Kokkigalaip Ponninaal Panni, Avaigalukku Naangu Vellippaadhangalai Vaarppiththaan.
37 koodaaravaasalukku Ilaneelanoolaalum Raththaambaranoolaalum Sivappunoolaalum Thiriththa Melliya Panjunoolaalum Seydha Siththirath Thaiyalvelaiyaana Oru Thongudhiraiyaiyum,
38 adhin Aindhu Thoongalaiyum, Avaigalin Valaivaanigalaiyum Undaakki, Avaigalin Kumizhgalaiyum Valaiyangalaiyum Pondhakattaal Moodinaan: Avaigalin Aindhu Paadhangalum Vengalamaayirundhadhu.
